meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the use of color, especially in art or design.
meanings.sent1: The talented colorist carefully selected the perfect shades for the painting.
meanings.sent2: The colorist enhanced the logo with vibrant hues to make it more appealing.
meanings.sent3: The colorist joked that they could make a rainbow out of just three colors.
meanings.sent4: Her work as a colorist transformed the dull room into a lively space.
meanings.sent5: The colorist's eye for color made the artwork come alive.

meanings.definition: A person who adds color to black-and-white films or photographs.
meanings.sent1: The skilled colorist expertly added color to the classic movie, bringing it to life.
meanings.sent2: The colorist's job was to carefully choose the right tones for the film scenes.
meanings.sent3: The colorist playfully said they could turn a grayscale world into a colorful one.
meanings.sent4: His role as a colorist painted a new perspective on the old photographs.
meanings.sent5: The colorist's touch of color made the movie scenes more vivid.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in the use of color in hair styling.
meanings.sent1: The experienced colorist blended different shades to create a stunning hair color.
meanings.sent2: The colorist's expertise in hair coloring techniques was evident in the salon.
meanings.sent3: The colorist humorously claimed they could make any hair color look natural.
meanings.sent4: She worked as a colorist, turning plain hair into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The colorist's magic touch with hair color left clients delighted.
